message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I propose a starting price of $15000. This reflects not only the cost of development and production but also the potential value it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I see the value in your product, $15000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it, which is the maximum I can afford at this time. Let me know if that works for you.
